entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 8:33 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
